description: This file defines a sealed class BottomNavItem representing items in a bottom navigation menu for an Android app using Jetpack Compose. It includes object instances for each navigation item with associated route, label, and icon, and a list of all bottom items.

classes.name: BottomNavItem
classes.description: A sealed class representing a bottom navigation item with properties route, label, and icon, with specific instances for Home, Dashboard, Add, Transactions, and Profile.

methods.name: BottomNavItem.Home
methods.description: Object representing the Home navigation item.

methods.name: BottomNavItem.Dashboard
methods.description: Object representing the Dashboard navigation item.

methods.name: BottomNavItem.Add
methods.description: Object representing the Add navigation item.

methods.name: BottomNavItem.Transactions
methods.description: Object representing the Transactions navigation item.

methods.name: BottomNavItem.Profile
methods.description: Object representing the Profile navigation item.
